nodes.text: Lathe was a female Human hailing from the Outer Rim world Saleucami. A slicer affiliated with the Veiled Sorority, Lathe was active during the Sorority's conflict with the Zann Consortium during the Galactic Civil War.

A slicer operating on Saleucami during the reign of the Galactic Empire, Lathe worked with the Veiled Sorority maintaining the SororiNet node installed on the planet. Residing in an apartment in Taleucema, Lathe seldom left the confines of her home, leaving only to resupply herself with booster blue. Carrying brass knuckles as a defensive weapon, Lathe was born during the Clone Wars.
